definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

pinyin: Yi1 si1 lan2 Sheng4 zhan4 Zu3 zhi1
Zhong1 guo2 Yi1 si1 lan2 jiao4 Xie2 hui4

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)

pinyin: Yi1 si1 lan2 Hui4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1
Yi1 si1 lan2 ma3 ba1 de2
Dong1 Tu1 jue2 si1 tan3 Yi1 si1 lan2 Yun4 dong4
containing_words.word: 東突厥斯坦伊斯蘭運動

sentences.english: It has a Heng Islam Yeshiva of Qinghai in this mosque.
sentences.chinese: 該清真寺內設立有青海阿橫伊斯蘭教經學院。

sentences.english: The prime minister was flying back to Islamabad from Lahore.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉尼總理當時正從拉合爾飛回伊斯蘭堡。

sentences.english: are typical of medieval Islamic glassware.
sentences.chinese: 都是中世紀伊斯蘭的玻璃製品所特有的。

sentences.english: Why is it resistant to secularization?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼伊斯蘭教抵抗世俗化？

sentences.english: The same is true in the West Bank and the Islamic world.
sentences.chinese: 約旦河西岸地區乃至整個伊斯蘭世界也是如此。

sentences.english: Is it the government or is it al-Shabab?
sentences.chinese: 是政府還是激進伊斯蘭組織青年黨？

sentences.english: The Maldivians followed Buddhism before they converted to Islam.
sentences.chinese: 在伊斯蘭教之前，馬爾代夫人是信仰佛教的。

sentences.english: The Egyptian poor are deeply imbued with teachings of Islam.
sentences.chinese: 埃及貧民深受伊斯蘭教教義的影響。

sentences.english: A "celebrated" Tunisian rapper supports Shariah law.
sentences.chinese: 一個“有名的”突尼斯說唱歌手支持伊斯蘭教法。

sentences.english: All of them trace their origins to the Golden Age of Muslim civilization.
sentences.chinese: 答案是，它們都可以追溯到伊斯蘭文明的黃金時代。

sentences.english: This ancient Islamic religious text has sold over 800 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 這本古老的伊斯蘭教教義典籍已售出8億本。

sentences.english: Islam does not permit this sort of barbaric crime.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭教不允許這樣的野蠻罪行。

sentences.english: Muslims around the world are marking the start of Islam's holy month of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的穆斯林紀念伊斯蘭神聖的拉馬丹齋月開始。

sentences.english: The Islamic civilization, he wrote, is the most troublesome.
sentences.chinese: 文中寫道，伊斯蘭文化是最麻煩的。

sentences.english: The Shabab says it has set up three units of suicide-bombers.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭青年黨宣稱他們已經組建了3自殺襲擊者小組。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
